News.Title: Patil Automation Plans Strategic Acquisitions Worth 36 Million Rupees
News.Summary: Patil Automation announced plans to acquire a 60% stake in Pentaco Automation for 30 million rupees and a stake in MII Robotics for 6 million rupees. The combined acquisition value totals 36 million rupees across both automation companies.

News.Title: Patil Automation: SME IPO Debut with Strong GMP
News.Summary: Patil Automation to list on NSE SME platform after 101.42 times oversubscribed IPO. Grey market premium indicates 26% potential listing gain. IPO raised Rs 69.61 crore for new manufacturing facility and debt repayment.
